content: there are six different ornaments in this pattern if you re looking for quick easy & fun ornaments to make for christmas you ve found them instructions include a basic ornament that can be worked with 3 different borders as well as separate instructions for a snowman mouse & 5 point star each ornament can be worked around any ring including a milk/juice jug plastic ring for additional stability they ll be the perfect addition to your tree and they make great stocking stuffers you can even add them to a garland or wrapped gifts for the perfect festive touch ***materials *** **➤yarn ** #4/worsted weight of any fiber i used lily sugar n cream **➤yardage ** 10-30 yds **➤hook ** 5 5 mm **➤optional ** wiggly eyes if you want to add facial features plastic milk/juice jug ring ~1 5 across center *note each ornament can be made with or without ring ring gives ornament stability to help keep its shape * *marsha yarndoodles links https //linktr ee/marshayarndoodles* this pattern is for personal use you may not alter sell copy transfer trade distribute or claim this pattern or its images as your own feel free to sell finished products made with this pattern please credit @marshayarndoodles as the pattern designer this pattern is property of @marshayarndoodles © 2023
